QuestData.Title: The Head of the Snake
QuestData.Description: Those naga have the Tidestone shards, $n. They will soon be dragging them into their watery holes, away from our reach.$b$bIt would be wise to take out their leaders before that happens.
QuestData.RewardText: You killed Athissa, $n.$b$bThat is to say, you and... and my people...$b$bMy people... they fought for us...$b$bBut, Warlord Parjesh has escaped through the portal with the Tidestone. You must pursue him and retrieve the Pillar of Creation.
